document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 99-16
document.heading: ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON AMENDING CHAPTER 12.04 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE ESTABLISHING SECTION 12.04.051 REGULATING THE PRACTICE OF SKATEBOARDING AT THE AMERICAN CANYON COMMUNITY CENTER, ITS GROUNDS, AND ADJACENT PARKLANDS
